http__purl_org_dc_terms_description: Directive 2009/147/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 30 November 2009 on the conservation of wild birds.

http__www_w3_org_2004_02_skos_core_prefL: Birds Directive Annex III, part A
http__www_w3_org_2004_02_skos_core_defin: The activities referred to in paragraph 1 [of the Birds Directive] shall not be prohibited in respect of the species referred to in Annex III, Part A, provided that the birds have been legally killed or captured or otherwise legally acquired.
The species mentioned in Annex I shall be the subject of special conservation measures concerning their habitat in order to ensure their survival and reproduction in their area of distribution.

http__www_w3_org_2004_02_skos_core_prefL: Birds Directive Annex II, part A
http__www_w3_org_2004_02_skos_core_defin: The species referred to in Annex II, Part A may be hunted in the geographical sea and land area where this Directive applies.

http__www_w3_org_2004_02_skos_core_prefL: Birds Directive Annex II, part B
http__www_w3_org_2004_02_skos_core_defin: The species referred to in Annex II, Part B may be hunted only in the Member States in respect of which they are indicated.

http__www_w3_org_2004_02_skos_core_prefL: Birds Directive Annex III, part B
http__www_w3_org_2004_02_skos_core_defin: Member States may, for the species listed in Annex III, Part B, allow within their territory the activities referred to in paragraph 1 [of the Birds Directive], making provision for certain restrictions, provided that the birds have been legally killed or captured or otherwise legally acquired.
